mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_CODE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,ORIGIN_COST ,RELEASE_DATE ,DISCOUNT_RATE ,SALES_QUANTITY ,STOCK_QUANTITY ,CATEGORY_CODE ,PRODUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCT_INFO ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,ORIGIN_COST ,RELEASE_DATE ,DISCOUNT_RATE ,SALES_QUANTITY ,STOCK_QUANTITY ,CATEGORY_CODE ,PRODUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCT_INFO
PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ value }, '%')
DISCOUNT_RATE = 0
DISCOUNT_RATE >= 1
CONCAT(YEAR(RELEASE_DATE), LPAD(MONTH(RELEASE_DATE),2,0)) = concat(year(now()), lpad(month(now()),2,0))
PRODUCTION_STATUS = 'N'
